CertificateArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:acm:[a-z]{2}((-gov)|(-iso(b?)))?-[a-z]+-\d{1}:\d{12}:certificate\/[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

BgpAsn.description:
For devices that support BGP, the customer gateway's BGP ASN.
 Default: 65000
